work.title: Front end Engineer
work.description: Front end leader for KAAX fintech project. KAAX is a currency exchange in real time without intermediaries platform. Landing page development using: NextJs, Redux, GraphQL and Strapi CMS.  Webapp development using ReactJS, Redux, Typescript, Sass and Websockets.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Front end Development for Bib & Tucker Application. Bib & Tucker is a web-based uniform provider and management tools for the hospitality industry in New York. Used technologies: Django framework, Javascript.
